list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove unnecessary .idea files
These .idea files have been deleted as they are system-specific and should not be tracked by Git. This change helps to keep the repository clean and reduces potential merge conflicts.

task.summary:
Optimize code and update dependencies
The code was optimized to remove unnecessary spacing, redundant initializations, and improve the usage of some functions. Moreover, the build file was updated to use newer versions of dependencies and the .gitignore file was updated to ignore more unnecessary files. Apart from optimization, some changes were made to handle exceptions and improve error messages more effectively.

Add project configuration files and README
This commit not only adds common IDE configuration files (.gitignore, misc.xml, modules.xml, vcs.xml, gradle.xml, etc) to standardize developer environment, but also introduces README.md containing project details and instructions. Additionally, project settings related to Git, Gradle, and Sonarlint are also included.

Update .gitignore exception rule
This change modifies the .gitignore rule for the .idea/ directory's exclusion. The updated rule now includes an exception for the .idea/ directory to allow certain files or subdirectories within it to be tracked.

Update .gitignore exception rule
This change modifies the .gitignore rule for the .idea/ directory's exclusion. The updated rule now includes an exception for the .idea/ directory to allow certain files or subdirectories within it to be tracked.

Remove unnecessary .idea files
These .idea files have been deleted as they are system-specific and should not be tracked by Git. This change helps to keep the repository clean and reduces potential merge conflicts.
